items.title: Edenâ€™s Waffle
items.descript: Made with a special gluten free and vegan batter recipe. Topped with your choice of: chocolate chips, bananas, strawberries, peanut butter, almond butter, bee pollen, raw honey, walnuts, coconut, and pumpkin seeds. Served with cashew & coconut butter and maple syrup.

items.title: Cinnamon & Blueberry Chickpea Bread
items.descript: Served with blueberry preserves, house-made almond yogurt, fresh strawberries, and banana.

items.title: Green Salad
items.descript: Assorted field greens, spinach, arugula, chopped kale, wakame seaweed, untoasted nori and avocado. Topped with walnuts and almonds and served with flax bread and a spinach and lemon vinaigrette.

items.title: Coconut & Chickpea Burger
items.descript: Served on a gluten free and vegan bun with cashew based, garlic aioli, lettuce, avocado, and tomato. Served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: Falafel Lettuce Wraps
items.descript: Pan-fried falafel, pumpkin seed and chickpea hummus, pickled vegetables, and cashew cucumber tzatziki sauce. Served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: Tofu Scramble
items.descript: Sauteed in a tomato based bbq sauce. With black beans, spinach, green peppers, and portobello mushrooms. Topped with cashew sour cream. With corn tortillas and avocado. Served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: Cheesy Vegetable Wrap
items.descript: Flax and carrot wrap. Filled with shredded broccoli, carrot, spinach, tomato, avocado, and zucchini. Smothered in a raw vegan cheese sauce. Served with fresh fruit and a garden salad.

items.title: Garden Salad
items.descript: Field greens, spinach, kale, tomato, carrots, cucumber, avocado, pumpkin seeds and cashew cheese. Comes with flax bread and a spinach lemon dressing.

items.title: Brie-Stuffed Strawberry French Toast
items.descript: Made with gluten free bread and spiced with nutmeg, cardamom, and orange zest. Served with cashew & coconut butter, strawberry preserves, and fresh strawberries.

items.title: Vegetable Omelette
items.descript: Three eggs filled with zucchini, broccoli, spinach and cheddar cheese. Comes with gluten free toast. Also served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: Curry Eggs
items.descript: Three eggs scrambled with goat cheese, curry spice and spinach. Comes with gluten free toast. Also served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: Egg Sandwich
items.descript: Served on gluten free bread, with sauteed spinach, avocado, tomato and brie cheese. Served with a side salad or fresh pineapple.

items.title: House made Pecan Granola
items.descript: Made with maple syrup, pecans, olive oil and gluten free oats. Topped with fresh strawberries and bananas and served on your choice of Greek yogurt or soy yogurt.

items.title: Mushroom & Almond Sausage
items.descript: Made with portobello mushrooms, fennel seed and almond meal.

items.title: Vanilla Chia Seed Pudding
items.descript: Made with coconut milk, served with fresh strawberries.

items.title: Tempeh Bacon
items.descript: Thick cut tempeh marinated in maple syrup, smoked salt and paprika.
